subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Tim Krul replaced the starting goalkeeper Jasper Cillessen late in extra time and made two crucial saves in a penalty shootout to help the Netherlands advance to the World Cup semifinals.
snippet: Tim Krul replaced the starting goalkeeper Jasper Cillessen late in extra time and made two crucial saves in a penalty shootout to help the Netherlands advance to the World Cup semifinals.
